### What content is covered?
This quiz reviews the terms and concepts introduced in Lesson 3, related to classification and analysis of archaeological data and how archaeologists interpret the results in reconstructing the past.

### Quiz Environment
This quiz is not proctored, and there is no time limit. You may use the lecture slideshows, textbook, and any other online resources provided to help you answer the questions. __This quiz may only be taken once.__

### Availability
The Lesson 3 Quiz is available Friday through the end of the day, Monday.
